Text: I just figured it out!  At first I thought you were using your Makita planer to smooth the surface of your records, for some reason.  I assume instead that you use it to spin a record dry after washing it.  If so, that's a pretty good idea.

Hi NPTO,

Thanks for your vinyl uploads.

Unfortunately, this upload of PS has hum. Please check your turntable, connections, grounding.

Sorry,

Oldies Guy
